of community television stations that will bring the Capitol into
every community where such a station exists.
c. The State has a responsibility for the education of all its citizens»
including those who have completed their formal education. Television
provides a means for the most effective distribution of knowledge and
enlightenment to this adult population.
d. The principle of community support of educational television has been
firmly established in this State. A means and a formula for matching
this community support from governmental funds should be sought.
